C

calcAddCost() - Method in class LongPipes.Pipe
ABSTRACT METHOD - overridden in subclasses, calculates the additional cost of a pipe
calcAddCost() - Method in class LongPipes.PipeTypeFive
Override of Abstract Pipe class method calculates the additional cost for the pipe and sets that price based on the Chemical Resistance, Colour Print, Inner Insulation and outer Reinforcement values.
calcAddCost() - Method in class LongPipes.PipeTypeFour
Override of Abstract Pipe class method calculates the additional cost for the pipe and sets that price based on the Chemical Resistance, Colour Print and Inner Insulation values.
calcAddCost() - Method in class LongPipes.PipeTypeOne
Override of Abstract Pipe class method calculates the additional cost for the pipe and sets that price based on the Chemical Resistance value.
calcAddCost() - Method in class LongPipes.PipeTypeThree
Override of Abstract Pipe class method calculates the additional cost for the pipe and sets that price based on the Chemical Resistance, Colour Print values.
calcAddCost() - Method in class LongPipes.PipeTypeTwo
Override of Abstract Pipe class method calculates the additional cost for the pipe and sets that price based on the Chemical Resistance value.
calcBaseCost() - Method in class LongPipes.Pipe
Calculate the cost of the pipe based on its core attributes: (length, volume, plastic grade and quantity)
calculateRadius(double) - Method in class LongPipes.Pipe
Calculate radius from given diameter (r = d/2)
calculateVolume(double, double) - Method in class LongPipes.Pipe
Calculates the volume of the pipe by calculating the area of the pipe cylinder and the cylinder of the air gap / hole inside the pipe and subtracting them, then multiplying by length (in inches) to get volume constant 0.9 = the radius of the gap inside the pipe as per long-pipes spec
clearFields() - Method in class LongPipes.Frontend
This will reset all the fields on the form that the user inputs pipe details into
